statements: SELECT * FROM SpaceTelescopeImages;
SELECT image_url, telescope_name FROM SpaceTelescopeImages;
SELECT capture_date, image_url FROM SpaceTelescopeImages ORDER BY capture_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM SpaceTelescopeImages WHERE telescope_name = 'Hubble';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SpaceTelescopeImages;
SELECT * FROM SpaceTelescopeImages WHERE telescope_name = 'Hubble' ORDER BY capture_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, image_url FROM SpaceTelescopeImages WHERE capture_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT image_url, capture_date FROM SpaceTelescopeImages WHERE capture_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY capture_date ASC;
SELECT id, telescope_name FROM SpaceTelescopeImages WHERE telescope_name = 'James Webb' ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT DISTINCT telescope_name FROM SpaceTelescopeImages WHERE capture_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM images
SELECT image_id, image_name, capture_date FROM images
SELECT image_id, image_name FROM images WHERE telescope_id = 1
SELECT * FROM videos WHERE capture_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT video_name, duration_seconds FROM videos ORDER BY video_name DESC
SELECT * FROM images WHERE telescope_id = 1 ORDER BY image_id DESC;
SELECT image_id, image_name FROM images WHERE capture_date > '2022-01-01' AND telescope_id IN (1, 2);
SELECT DISTINCT telescope_id FROM images WHERE capture_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY telescope_id;
SELECT image_name, capture_date FROM images JOIN videos ON images.telescope_id = videos.telescope_id WHERE videos.duration_seconds > 60;
SELECT image_id, capture_date, telescope_id FROM images WHERE image_name LIKE 'Sun_%';
SELECT image_url, capture_date FROM Images WHERE image_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Videos WHERE capture_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT telescope_name, location FROM Telescopes ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT scientist_id, COUNT(telescope_id) AS telescope_count FROM Telescopes GROUP BY scientist_id HAVING telescope_count > 1;
SELECT image_id, image_url, Telescopes.telescope_name FROM Images INNER JOIN Telescopes ON Images.telescope_id = Telescopes.telescope_id;
SELECT * FROM Images WHERE image_id = 1;
SELECT image_id, image_url, capture_date FROM Images WHERE telescope_id = 3;
SELECT image_url, capture_date FROM Images WHERE capture_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM Videos WHERE telescope_id IN (SELECT telescope_id FROM Telescopes WHERE location = 'Hawaii');
SELECT I.image_id, I.image_url, T.telescope_name, T.location FROM Images I INNER JOIN Telescopes T ON I.telescope_id = T.telescope_id;
SELECT * FROM images;
SELECT image_id, image_name, captured_date FROM images WHERE telescope_id = 1;
SELECT video_name, video_path FROM videos WHERE captured_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM research_projects WHERE project_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM telescopes WHERE telescope_location = 'Mauna Kea';
SELECT * FROM images WHERE telescope_id = 1;
SELECT image_name, image_path FROM images WHERE captured_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT images.image_name, telescopes.telescope_name FROM images JOIN telescopes ON images.telescope_id = telescopes.telescope_id;
SELECT * FROM videos WHERE captured_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY video_id DESC;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM research_projects WHERE end_date IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM images;
SELECT name, resolution FROM videos WHERE duration > 60;
SELECT id, name FROM telescopes WHERE launch_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, name, affiliation FROM researchers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT observation_date, image_id FROM observations WHERE researcher_id = '12345';
SELECT * FROM images WHERE resolution = 'HD';
SELECT id, name, size FROM images WHERE size > 1000 ORDER BY name DESC;

SELECT observations.id, telescopes.name AS telescope, researchers.name AS researcher FROM observations JOIN telescopes ON observations.telescope_id = telescopes.id JOIN researchers ON observations.researcher_id = researchers.id ORDER BY observations.observation_date DESC;
SELECT videos.id, videos.name, observations.observation_date FROM videos JOIN observations ON videos.id = observations.video_id WHERE videos.duration > 300 ORDER BY observations.observation_date ASC;

SELECT researchers.name, researchers.affiliation, COUNT(observations.id) AS num_observations FROM researchers JOIN observations ON researchers.id = observations.researcher_id GROUP BY researchers.name, researchers.affiliation HAVING COUNT(observations.id) > 5;
